onboarding.welcomeDescription: Add DOJO to your apps and receive a welcome gift of 1 $DOJO.
onboarding.addApp: Ok, I'll take a free gift
onboarding.addFailed: Could not add app. Please try again.
onboarding.successDescription: Your daily training journey begins now.

howItWorks.barText: New here? Learn how DOJO works
howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.page1Desc: Start by backing the $SEKI project on Hunt.town. When you add the app we'll give you your first $SEKI for free.
howItWorks.page2Desc: Collect your previous day's $SEKI earnings from Hunt.town to your wallet.
howItWorks.page3Desc: More $DOJO in your wallet gives you a higher daily check-in bonus.
howItWorks.page4Desc: Check in to maintain your streak and collect your daily $DOJO bonus.
howItWorks.page5Desc: Keep your streak going to earn a weekly bonus and increase your daily bonus rate.
howItWorks.page5RateNote: Your daily bonus rate scales from 0.1% to 0.2% of your $DOJO holdings over your first 30 days.
